settings.title: Description
settings.content:
The Standard, Redefined.

The Edgerunner wasn't designed for riders who want a toy. It was engineered for those who expect their equipment to perform ‚Äî every time, without exception.

Dual rated 1400W motor delivering up to 4200W of peak power. 30-degree climb capability. But power is only half the equation. The throttle response has been algorithmically tuned for linear, predictable acceleration ‚Äî so it answers to you, not the other way around.

IPX6 rated and built to go harder. Engineered to withstand heavy rain and powerful water spray, the Edgerunner is ready for serious riding in tough conditions. Rain, splashes, no worries.


This is velocity you command, not velocity that commands you.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.content:
Delivery

  • Free shipping Australia-wide.
  • Orders ship within 1-2 business days.
  • Standard delivery typically takes 2-8 business days.

Pick-Up (Victoria Only)
Easy collection from our Boronia warehouse. We'll assemble your scooter on the spot.

settings.title: Warranty & Returns
settings.content:
Warranty
All of our scooters come with limited warranty. For details, see our warranty page

Returns
For information on our return policy, including eligibility and instructions, please visit our Returns & Refunds Policy.

settings.title: Certification
settings.content:
Our E-Scooters (including batteries) are tested to meet the following:

  • EN17128
  • CE EMC
  • ROHS

settings.title: BUNDLE UP AND SAVE BIG
settings.content: Free Edgerunner Helmet included with all bundles!

settings.text: AUSTRALIAN QUALITY CONTROL ‚Ä¢ NFC ACTIVATION ‚Ä¢ NUTT HYDRAULIC BRAKES ‚Ä¢ 4200W PEAK POWER
The Professional Standard. Premium Components. Precision-Tuned.
Designed for the way you actually ride.

settings.title: Zero Speed Wobble
settings.content: A hydraulic steering stabiliser absorbs high-speed oscillations eliminating the 'death wobble' that plagues unstable machines.

settings.title: Keyless Ignition
settings.content: NFC ignition replaces the traditional key system entirely. A single tap on your secure card authenticates and unlocks the powertrain instantly.

settings.title: Visible From Every Angle
settings.content: High-visibility turn indicators are integrated front and rear, ensuring your intentions are visible to surrounding traffic from every angle.

settings.title: 3-Second Fold
settings.content: The Edgerunner collapses in three seconds and locks completely rigid. No flex, no rattle ‚Äî just a machine that stores as solidly as it rides.
Power without refinement is just noise. The Edgerunner pairs genuine performance with the throttle calibration to make that power usable, predictable, and yours to command.

settings.tab_1_description: High speed demands high stability. The Edgerunner's chassis and throttle map were tuned together, so the machine feels as planted at 80 as it does at 20.
settings.tab_2_description: Raw acceleration is easy. Controlled acceleration is engineering. The Edgerunner launches without the unpredictable torque spike that makes lesser machines dangerous off the line.
settings.tab_3_description: 4,200W of dual-motor torque means hills don't change the equation. Momentum is maintained on steep gradients ‚Äî no straining, no stalling.

settings.title: Built for Real Conditions.
settings.content: Sealed electronics, protected battery housing, and weather-resistant componentry throughout. The Edgerunner doesn't ask you to check the forecast before you ride.

settings.title: See and Be Seen.
settings.content: A high-output LED headlight with 100-metre visibility ‚Äî enough range to illuminate the road ahead and enough presence to make you unmistakable to oncoming traffic.
Stability at speed, comfort over distance, and a frame that doesn't assume you're built like a mannequin.

settings.title: Max. Load
settings.content: A frame and deck engineered to handle adult riders without flex or strain.

settings.title: Ground Clearance
settings.content: Enough clearance to handle gutters, speed bumps, and uneven roads without scraping.

settings.title: Tyre Size
settings.content: 10 inches of tubeless, high-performance rubber. Fewer failure points. More grip. Better ride.

settings.title: Recommended Height
settings.content: A deck height and handlebar position calibrated for riders from 5'5" - 6'5".

settings.title: Full-Colour LCD
settings.content: Speed, battery, mode, odometer ‚Äî all visible at a glance, even in direct sunlight.

settings.title: Ergonomic Grips
settings.content: Comfort-contoured grips designed for longer rides.

settings.title: Left Thumb Controls
settings.content: Indicators, beam, horn. Accessible without releasing the handlebar.

settings.title: BUILT FOR THE AUSTRALIAN TERRAIN
settings.content: Australian roads aren't built for comfort. From rough suburban streets to steep coastal hills, our terrain demands serious capability. That's why we engineered the Kaiju for Australian conditions. It conquers our challenging landscapes while meeting global safety standards and backed by local Aussie support.

*Range Testing:¬†In flat surface testing under economical conditions (Full Battery, rear motor only, 13 kph, windless), the Edgerunner achieved 110 km with a 80 kg load.¬†

Real world range on varied Australian terrain (Full Battery), using a mix of rear and dual motor at an average speed of 20kph, the Edgerunner delivered approx. 65 km with a 80 kg load.¬†

Disclaimer: Top speed, hill climb and range figures are based on tests with an 80 kg rider under optimal and economical conditions. Actual performance may vary significantly depending on rider weight, terrain, weather, and riding style.

settings.title: Is TSC Aussie owned and operated?
settings.content:
Yes. The Simple Commute aka TSC was founded in March 2024 and officially launched in September 2024 by Hamlet and Ben here in Melbourne.

It‚Äôs now proudly owned and run by 3 young Aussies - Hamlet, Ben and Puneet. All our operations, from customer service to logistics and repairs, are handled right here in Melbourne. Head to our¬†About Us¬†page to learn more about the team and our story.

settings.title: Why should I choose TSC over other brands?
settings.content:
Because we actually care about you, not just the sale. At TSC, you get¬†local Aussie support,¬†fair pricing, and scooters that are¬†built and tested for Australian roads. We only work with¬†highly reputable manufacturers, and every model we release goes through strict¬†global-standard testing¬†‚Äî our scooters and batteries hold some of the¬†highest safety certifications in the industry.

Most importantly,¬†we value customer relationships more than sales. Whether you‚Äôre just browsing or ready to buy, you‚Äôll always get honest advice and genuine support. That‚Äôs what sets us apart.

settings.title: Is the Edgerunner electric scooter legal to ride in public?
settings.content: Yes. All our electric scooters are capped at 25 km/h to comply with Australian regulations, making them legal to ride in public.

settings.title: Does the 250w rule apply to TSC electric scooters?
settings.content: No. The 250w rule applies only to e-bikes, not e-scooters. Our electric scooters are classified as Personal Mobility Devices (PMDs) in Australia. The key regulation for PMDs is that they must be capped at 25 km/h for public use, regardless of motor wattage.

settings.title: Does the Edgerunner ride well on the road?
settings.content: Yes. it rides very smoothly on the road thanks to its large 10-inch high performance tyre setup. It handles city streets with ease and doesn‚Äôt make much noise while cruising.

settings.title: What makes Edgerunner different from other electric scooters?
settings.content:
The Edgerunner was engineered for riders who expect equipment, not experiments. Where most high-performance scooters prioritise raw speed over refinement, the Edgerunner pairs genuine capability ‚Äî 4,200W, 85km/h, 30-degree climb ‚Äî with a throttle map tuned for linear, predictable acceleration, a hydraulic steering damper that eliminates high-speed wobble, and sealed IP56 componentry built for real weather.

It's backed by Australian support, pre-ride inspection, and the kind of spec transparency that most brands avoid. This isn't a toy with a top-speed sticker. It's a machine designed to perform reliably, every ride, without drama.

settings.title: How can I properly secure my Edgerunner electric scooter?
settings.content:
GPS tracking sounds handy but can be bypassed.

The best way is to take it with you whenever possible. If you can‚Äôt, use a strong lock, or even better, multiple locks, to make thieves think twice.

TSC offers tough, high-quality security options like disc brake locks, key locks, heavy-duty chains and alarm locks. Check out our¬†accessories page¬†to keep your Edgerunner safe.

settings.title: How can I unlock the speed?
settings.content:
You can unlock the speed for private use by emailing our team directly after purchase with your order number ready.

Email our customer support to learn more about the unlock process.

settings.title: Where can I ride my electric scooter?
settings.content:
In Australia, the regulatory landscape for electric scooters is a patchwork of diverse legislation, with each state and territory crafting its own unique set of guidelines. These region-specific rules govern various aspects of e-scooter usage, including rider eligibility, permissible operating areas, and speed limitations.

Before investing in an electric scooter, it's crucial for potential owners to familiarise themselves with the local regulations that will impact their riding experience. Navigating this complex web of laws can be challenging, so make sure you do your research.¬†

Please visit the links below for the regulations in your state:

üìç SA

settings.title: Are your batteries safe?
settings.content: Yes, our batteries are extremely safe. They meet the highest global safety certifications - one of the most rigorous battery safety standards in the world. Additionally, our smart Battery Management System (BMS) features six layers of protection including short circuit protection, overcurrent protection, and temperature resistance.

settings.title: Are there any financing options?
settings.content:
Yes, we offer flexible financing options. You can choose from:

Zip Pay - Split your purchase into interest-free installments
Afterpay - Buy now, pay later in 4 easy payments

Both options are available at checkout.
